SELECT M.LOT_NUM, (SELECT P.PROD_NAME FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.PROD_ID = M.PROD_ID) AS PROD_NAME, M.INST_AMT, M.PROD_AMT, TO_CHAR(M.INST_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')INST_DATE, TO_CHAR(M.PROD_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')PROD_DATE, EMP_ID FROM PRODUCTION M ORDER BY M.LOT_NUM ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE INSTRUCTIONS SET PROD_AMT = #{prodAmt}, PROD_DATE = #{prodDate}, EMP_ID = #{empId} WHERE LOT_NUM = #{lotNum}
UPDATE MATER_INVENTORY SET OUTPUT = OUTPUT + #{deduct}, INVENTORY = INVENTORY - #{deduct} WHERE MATER_ID = #{materId}
mapper.select: SELECT MI.MATER_ID, MI.INVENTORY, MI.OUTPUT, B.CONTENT FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN BOM_TEST B ON P.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID INNER JOIN MATER_INVENTORY MI ON B.MATER_ID = MI.MATER_ID WHERE P.PROD_ID = #{prodId} ORDER BY MI.MATER_ID ASC
